query.esql:
FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id) by source.ip
| RENAME `COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id)` as `# Rules`, `COUNT()` as `# Hits`, source.ip as src_ip
| SORT `# Rules` DESC, `# Hits` ASC
| KEEP src_ip, `# Rules`,`# Hits`

FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id) by source.ip
| RENAME `COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id)` as `# Rules`, `COUNT()` as `# Hits`, source.ip as src_ip
| SORT `# Rules` DESC, `# Hits` ASC
| KEEP src_ip, `# Rules`,`# Hits`

FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip) by event.severity, rule.signature_id, rule.name
| RENAME event.severity as Severity, rule.name as Signature, rule.signature_id as SID, `COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip)` as `# Sources`, `COUNT()` as Count
| SORT `# Sources` DESC, Count DESC
| KEEP Severity, Signature, SID, `# Sources`, Count

FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip) by event.severity, rule.signature_id, rule.name
| RENAME event.severity as Severity, rule.name as Signature, rule.signature_id as SID, `COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip)` as `# Sources`, `COUNT()` as Count
| SORT `# Sources` DESC, Count DESC
| KEEP Severity, Signature, SID, `# Sources`, Count
